contract_description: The Supplier shall provide the following HP laptops to the Buyer: • HP Laptop Model A • HP Laptop Model B • HP Laptop Model C
pricing_and_payment_terms: The pricing for the HP laptops shall be as follows: • HP Laptop Model A: $800 per unit • HP Laptop Model B: $1000 per unit • HP Laptop Model C: $1200 per unit
termination_clause: Either party may terminate this Contract with 30 days written notice to the other party. Either party may terminate this Contract immediately in the event of a material breach by the other party.
